title: FS: SOLD T206 Howard Hindu SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: SOLD T206 Howard Hindu SOLD
posts.post_content:
FS: Hi Guys I have a T206 Howard Old Mill in rough shape, and a T206 Howard HINDU PSA Authentic - Altered It looks to me that the altered is someone took a ruler and touched up the black border on the sides with a pencil . I am open to serious offers on the Hindu. Howard is a tough Hindu as many of you know. I prefer paypal no fee... Thanks in advance Ralph 


SOLD
